page.title: 12MELROSE GRAMMAR SCHOOL
page.content: Melrose Grammar School was built in 1877. It is a mixed primary school with an age range roughly from 5-12. Although the main building dates from 1877,the hall was built in 1913 and classes 1,2,3, were added in 1957. There are 185 children in the school, who come mainly from the area of Melrose.There are 7 classes in the school,two of which are composite. The class numbers range from 25 to 30.The school has 12 classrooms which house 8 full time teachers and 5 part time teachers.The school building is used out of school hours for various activities e,g, Brownies and Adult Keep Fit.Each year the school is involved in the local Melrose Festival.The Festival Queen is chosen from the primary 7 class and is usually the dux of the school.
